name: Twitter Tools – Piwik Campaign Tagger
author: Reto Mantz

sections.description:
This plugin helps integrate your blogs twittering into Piwik (http://www.piwik.org) more tightly. Whenever you post a blog entry and Twitter Tools tweets your post, this plugin will add a “piwik_campaign=twitter” to your post’s url and then shorten it. This way, you can keep track better of the visits that come to your site following your tweets.

This plugin builds on Alex King’s Twitter-Tools plugin (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/twitter-tools/) and does not work without it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload twitter-tools_piwikcampaign.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: This plugin adds a "piwik_campaign=twitter" to the URL that is published by Twitter-Tools and then shortens it using bit.ly.
